relevantInformation: Alcatraz Island tickets must be booked well in advance, and specific ferry times should be confirmed. The estimated arrival at Pier 33 assumes you have a ferry booking around 3:00 PM - 3:30 PM.
House of Prime Rib is a popular restaurant; reservations are highly recommended, especially for dinner.
The day is very packed, starting early and ending late. It involves significant travel between locations; ride-sharing or public transport is recommended to stay on schedule.

Your starting location (750 Kearny St) is in the heart of Chinatown. You can explore the neighborhood informally around your hotel. The secondary activity address provided for "Chinatown" (2180 Chestnut St) is actually in the Marina District and has been omitted to maintain an efficient route.
All primary activities and two out of three secondary activities (Mission Dolores Park and Fisherman's Wharf) are included in this itinerary.
